name: AzureProjectTestLib.ResourceGroupTest.Test01_ResourceGroupExist AzureProjectTestLib.ResourceGroupTest.Test02_ResourceGroupLocation
instruction: Can you create a resource group named 'projProd' in Hong Kong?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test01_StorageAccountsWithTag
instruction: Can you create a Storage account in resource group 'projProd' and add tag name 'usage' and value 'logic'?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test02_StorageAccountsWithTag
instruction: Can you create a Storage account in resource group 'projProd' and add tag name 'usage' and value 'StaticWeb'?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test03_StorageAccountSettings
instruction: Can you change your Storage account tagged 'usage' with 'logic' to southeastasia, AccessTier to Hot, StorageV2, Standard_LRS and allow public access?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test04_WebStorageAccountSettings
instruction: Can you change your Storage account tagged 'usage' with 'StaticWeb' to eastasia, AccessTier to Hot, StorageV2, Standard_LRS and allow public access?I need the index page of text 'This is index page.' and the error page of text 'This is error page.'.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test05_StorageAccountCodeContainer
instruction: I need a Blob container named 'code' in Storage account tagged 'usage' with 'logic'. Can you help?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test06_StorageAccountMessageTable
instruction: I need a Azure table named 'message' in Storage account tagged 'usage' with 'logic'. Can you help?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.StorageAccountTest.Test07_StorageAccountJobQueue
instruction: I need a Azure Storage Queue named 'job' in Storage account tagged 'usage' with 'logic'. Can you help?

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test01_Have2VnetsIn2Regions AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test02_VnetAddressSpace
instruction: Create 2 VNets: 'projVnet1Prod' in 'southeastasia' with CIDR '10.0.0.0/16' and 'projVnet2Prod' in 'eastasia' with CIDR '10.1.0.0/16'.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test03_VnetWith2Subnets AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test04_Vnet1SubnetsCidr AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test05_Vnet2SubnetsCidr
instruction: Create 2 subnets in vnet 'projVnet1Prod' with CIDRs 10.0.1.0/24 and 10.0.0.0/24; then create 2 subnets in vnet 'projVnet2Prod' with CIDRs 10.1.1.0/24 and 10.1.0.0/24.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test06_Vnet1PublicSubnetsRoutes
instruction: In vnet 'projVnet1Prod', for subnet 10.0.1.0/24, attach a route table with routes: 10.0.0.0/16 -> VnetLocal and 0.0.0.0/0 -> Internet.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test07_Vnet2PublicSubnetsRoutes
instruction: In vnet 'projVnet2Prod', for subnet 10.1.1.0/24, attach a route table with routes: 10.1.0.0/16 -> VnetLocal and 0.0.0.0/0 -> Internet.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test08_Vnet1PrivateSubnetsRoutes
instruction: In vnet 'projVnet1Prod', for subnet 10.0.0.0/24, attach a route table with a VnetLocal route to 10.0.0.0/16 (private subnet).

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test09_Vnet2PrivateSubnetsRoutes
instruction: In vnet 'projVnet2Prod', for subnet 10.1.0.0/24, attach a route table with a VnetLocal route to 10.1.0.0/16 (private subnet).

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test10_Vnet1PublicSubnetsNatGateway
instruction: Add a Standard NAT Gateway (zone 1) for subnet 10.0.1.0/24.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test11_VnetGlobalPeering
instruction: Add a Virtual Network Peering from 'projVnet1Prod' to 'projVnet2Prod' (remote). Allow Forwarded Traffic and Virtual Network Access; do not allow Gateway Transit.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test12_Vnet1PublicSubnetNetworkSecurityGroup
instruction: Add 2 NSG rules to subnet 10.0.1.0/24: (1) Allow HTTP inbound from anywhere with priority 201; (2) Allow all TCP outbound to anywhere with priority 100.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test13_Vnet2PublicSubnetNetworkSecurityGroup
instruction: Add 2 NSG rules to subnet 10.1.1.0/24: (1) Allow HTTP inbound from anywhere with priority 201; (2) Allow all TCP outbound to anywhere with priority 100.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test14_Vnet1PrivateSubnetNetworkSecurityGroup
instruction: Add 2 NSG rules to subnet 10.0.0.0/24: (1) Allow HTTP inbound from 10.1.0.0/24 with priority 201; (2) Allow all TCP outbound to anywhere with priority 100.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.VnetTests.Test15_Vnet2PrivateSubnetNetworkSecurityGroup
instruction: Add 2 NSG rules to subnet 10.1.0.0/24: (1) Allow HTTP inbound from 10.0.0.0/24 with priority 201; (2) Allow all TCP outbound to anywhere with priority 100.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.ApplicationInsightTest.Test01_AppServicePlanWithTag AzureProjectTestLib.ApplicationInsightTest.Test02_AppServicePlanSettings
instruction: Can you create an Application Insights in Hong Kong? Type is 'other', keep logs for 30 days, and add tag 'key'='ApplicationInsights'.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test01_AppServicePlanWithTag AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test02_FunctionAppsWithTag AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test03_AppServicePlanSettings
instruction: Can you create an Azure Function App v4 in Hong Kong for Node.js 16? Use Windows in the Consumption plan. Tag the AppServicePlan with {key:AppServicePlan}.Tag the FunctionApps with {key:FunctionApp}.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test04_AzureFunctionBinding
instruction: Create a Node.js Azure Function with the exact binding JSON: {"disabled":false,"bindings":[{"type":"httpTrigger","name":"req","direction":"in","dataType":"string","authLevel":"anonymous","methods":["get"]},{"type":"http","direction":"out","name":"res"},{"type":"queue","name":"jobQueue","queueName":"job","direction":"out","connection":"StorageConnectionAppSetting"},{"tableName":"message","name":"messageTable","type":"table","direction":"out","connection":"StorageConnectionAppSetting"}]}

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test04_FunctionAppSettings
instruction: I want to set and confirm app settings:1. WEBSITE_RUN_FROM_PACKAGE to Storage account with tag name 'usage' and value 'logic' URL i.e. https://{storageAccount.Name}.blob.core.windows.net/code/app.zip.2. StorageConnectionAppSetting to Storage account with tag name 'usage' and value 'logic' primary connect string.3. WEBSITE_CONTENTAZUREFILECONNECTIONSTRING to Storage account with tag name 'usage' and value 'logic' primary connect string.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test05_AzureFunctionCallWithHttpResponse
instruction: Update a Node.js Azure Function source code: when receiving a GET request ?user=tester&message=<value>, return 'Hello, tester and I received your message: <value>'

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test05_FunctionAppSettingsInstrumentationKey
instruction: I want to set and confirm app settings: APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY to the Application Insights InstrumentationKey.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test06_AzureFunctionCallSaveDataToAzureTable
instruction: Update a Node.js Azure Function source code: when receiving a GET request ?user=tester&message=<value>, then save PartitionKey 'tester' and RowKey '<value>' into Azure Table 'message'.

name: AzureProjectTestLib.AppServiceTest.Test07_AzureFunctionCallPutMessageToQueue
instruction: Update a Node.js Azure Function source code: when receiving a GET request ?user=tester&message=<value>, then put a JSON message {'user':'tester','message':'<value>','time':'<current time>'} into Azure Storage queue 'job'.
